text: Sergei Yurievich Yursky (, 16 March 1935 – 8 February 2019) was a Soviet-born Russian actor, theatre director and screenwriter. His best known works were The Little Golden Calf, Time, Forward! and The Meeting Place Cannot Be Changed. He was born in Leningrad, Soviet Union. Yursky died on 8 February 2019 from cardiac arrest in Moscow, aged 83.Умер Сергей Юрский ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1935 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from cardiac arrest Category:Russian movie actors Category:Russian stage actors Category:Russian television actors
title: Sergei Yursky
